channel.title: NPC exp rate in a non- Dodian server
channel.description: I need to change the exp rate in my server because it takes like 1 day to get to level 126 -.- I want it to take a little longer than that, please post , thanks!

item.title: NPC exp rate in a non- Dodian server
item.dc:creator: @Soul_Breaker Soul Breaker
item.description:
@Soul_Breaker wrote:

Okay, this is how you change it.
first, you search

TotalExp = (double)

Just change the xp and the 2

[ The first 1 is for attack, 2nd for strenght, 3rd is defence. ]

Read full topic
item.source: NPC exp rate in a non- Dodian server
